data.text: @SenBlumenthal @MSNOWNews You dont think Black folk can get an ID to prove who they are to vote? Thats a bit racist dont yall White Liberals think?

@SenBlumenthal @SenateDems @MSNOWNews Is it unconstitutional? What does 
SCOUS say?

@SenBlumenthal @MSNOWNews 71% of Democrats,  and 93% of Republicans want Voter ID and only citizens voting.  Youre thinking must be flawed...or, as we know, you need illegals to vote in order for Dems to be elected!  We're not stupid...you are really vile and dishonest!
@SenBlumenthal @MSNOWNews Only the crooks don’t want legit elections.

@SenBlumenthal @MSNOWNews He is completely lying. Look no further than California. I lived in California for about 10 years and the level of corruption in the electoral system there is unbelievable. It’s so unbelievable  is why they keep getting away with it.

@SenBlumenthal @MSNOWNews US citizens Mercy appeal....Section 301 g of Immigration and Nationality Act may be amended by bi-partisan bill to remove or reduce( to 3 years) of 5 years physical presence requirement in US because it is hindrance for US Citizens Parent to transmit US Citizenship to Children

@SenBlumenthal @MSNOWNews This man represents a state that had local elections overturned and completely redone due to drop box and mail in fraud. Now claiming no such fraud exists arou d an entire country
